title: Calories in Yellow Potatoes
meta_description: Learn calories in yellow potatoes per 100g, with carbs, protein, fiber, fats, and tips for variations in preparation.
assumptions: Raw yellow potatoes (e.g., Yukon Gold), with skin; values approximate for boiled or baked without added fats or salt.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, cooking method, and soil conditions. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of yellow potatoes provide ~77 kcal, mainly from carbs, with 2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Baked with 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Mashed with 1 tbsp butter per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g yellow potatoes?
faqs.a: About 77 kcal per 100 g raw or boiled.

faqs.q: Are yellow potatoes high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, ~17.5 g carbs per 100 g, mostly starch with 2.1 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in yellow potatoes?

faqs.a: Very low, only 0.1 g total fat per 100 g.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in yellow potatoes?
faqs.a: Boiling or baking keeps calories similar; added fats like oil or butter increase them significantly.
